name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kindle, Nook and Kobo Book Deals

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kindle Book Deals, Nook Book Deals and Kobo Book Deals are directly in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free! 

'Kindle, Nook and Kobo Book Deals' brings you the best Kindle Book Deals, Nook Book Deals and Kobo Book Deals. 

Note: You'll need the separate Kindle, Nook and Kobo Apps to read the books. 

'Kindle, Nook and Kobo Book Deals' brings you - 

1) The very best kindle book deals each day. 

2) The very best nook book deals each week. 

3) The very best kobo book deals each week. 

Note: You MUST check the prices at the Amazon, B&N and Kobo websites BEFORE buying the book. Please check the prices at the website. Prices change all the time. The Amazon, B&N and Kobo websites are the only final price reference. 

Note: Only Kindle Store, Nook Store and Kobo are supported. 

Note: You can filter by genre. However, filtering out genres will greatly reduce the number of books you see. It's advised to choose all genres. 

Note: Erotica books are hidden. To reveal them, go to Settings and check the checkbox next to Erotica. 

Note: Amazon, Kindle, Kindle Fire, Kindle Store are all Amazon trademarks. Nook, B&N, Nook HD, Nook Store are all Barnes and Noble trademarks. Kobo, kobobooks.com and related words, domain names and logos are trade-marks and the property of Kobo Inc. They are only used to illustrate what this app is about. 

'Kindle, Nook and Kobo Book Deals' brings you the very best book deals every day - Get it now!
